author: joey.chessher
title: Reaching the Business Community
description: How to influence the Business Community to use the Cardano Blockchain, it's products and resources for the next Business Project or Product
importance: Expanding into the Business community is critical to growth. Businesses need to think Cardano when building their next products or services
success: Many Financial business have teams exploring blockchain.  Success would be these companies using the Cardano Blockchain for development.
